sentences.en: Certain parts of the plate boundaries along subduction zones appear to be aseismic.
sentences.cn: 沿消减带的某些板块边界似乎长期无震.

sentences.en: Dragon subduction lake that no longer seen.
sentences.cn: 龙女即潜没潭中,不再露面.

sentences.en: Eclogite plays an important role in mantle convection and dynamics in subduction zone.
sentences.cn: 超高压榴辉岩在地幔对流、壳-幔物质循环和俯冲带动力学起着重要作用.

sentences.en: In the past 300 years, no earthquake nearly that large — nothing larger than magnitude-eight — had struck in the Japan subduction zone.
sentences.cn: 在过去的300年里，在日本俯冲地区，从没发生过一个如此巨大的地震-没有一次比八级还大。

sentences.en: Is There a Neo - Tethys'Subduction Record Earlier than arc volcanic rocks in the Sangri Group?
sentences.cn: 存在比桑日群弧火山岩更早的新特提斯洋俯冲记录 么 ?

sentences.en: Most volcanoes occur near the leading edges of moving plates – near the subduction zone.
sentences.cn: 大多数火山都出现在移动板块的前边缘附近–接近沉降区.

sentences.en: Since the Permian, the Tarim Basin had undergone basinal extension, subduction and intro - continental orogeny.
sentences.cn: 塔里木盆地自二叠纪以来, 历经盆地扩张和盆地俯冲以及陆内造山作用的过程.

sentences.en: The Andes will gain elevation overlevel from the pole shift due to Pacific subduction.
sentences.cn: 因为极移造成了太平洋收缩,安第斯山脉的海拔将会升高.

sentences.en: The seismic subduction zones have shown signs of rapid movement recently.
sentences.cn: 那板块沉淀区最近有急剧的移动.

sentences.en: The site of this destruction is another kind of plate boundary: a subduction zone.
sentences.cn: 销毁旧岩石圈的地方形成另外一种板块边界: 一块潜没的区域.

sentences.en: The south Tianshan ocean polarity of subduction is south to north.
sentences.cn: 而且中天山南缘洋盆俯冲极性应向北.

sentences.en: This allows the ear nerve to be tempered, frequency noise damage, there is a certain subduction.
sentences.cn: 这样可以让耳朵的神经得到锻炼, 对低频噪音的伤害, 有一定的消减作用.

sentences.en: This is called a subduction zone.
This occurs in trenches, also called subduction zones.
sentences.cn: 这个过程发生在海沟.也叫作俯冲带.

sentences.en: Through the low stress subduction of oceanic plate crustal extension has dominated in Southeastern China.
sentences.cn: 晚白垩世以来大洋板块属于低应力型俯冲,拉张是东南部主构造.

sentences.en: Two subduction zones, the Ryukyu trench and Manila trench, exist in the East Asia continental margin.
sentences.cn: 东亚大陆边缘自北向南发育了琉球海沟和马尼拉海沟等俯冲带.

trans.tran_cn: 减去，减法，[地]潜没（指地壳的板块沉到另一板块之下）
